title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti until al dente.
While pasta cooks, fry pancetta in a large skillet over medium heat until crispy.
In a bowl, beat eggs and mix with grated Parmesan cheese and black pepper.
Drain pasta, reserving 1 cup of pasta water.
Add hot pasta to the pancetta skillet off the heat.
Pour egg mixture over pasta and toss quickly, adding pasta water as needed to create a creamy sauce.
Serve immediately with extra Parmesan and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Heat butter in a large pan and sauté onion and garlic until softened.
Add tikka masala paste and cook for 1-2 minutes until fragrant.
Add tomato sauce and coconut milk, stirring well.
Add chicken pieces and simmer for 20-25 minutes until cooked through.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Garnish with fresh cilantro.
Serve with rice or naan bread.

title: Margherita Pizza
summary: Fresh mozzarella, basil, tomatoes, and olive oil on a thin crispy crust.
instructions: Preheat oven to 220°C (425°F).
Roll out pizza dough on a floured surface to desired thickness.
Transfer to pizza stone or baking sheet.
Spread tomato sauce evenly, leaving a ½ inch border for crust.
Tear mozzarella and distribute over sauce.
Drizzle with olive oil and season with salt and pepper.
Bake for 12-15 minutes until crust is golden.
Top with fresh basil leaves immediately after removing from oven.
Slice and serve hot.

title: Thai Green Curry
summary: A aromatic and spicy curry made with green chilies, coconut milk, and fresh herbs.
instructions: Heat 2-3 tbsp coconut milk in a pan over medium heat.
Add green curry paste and fry until aromatic, about 2-3 minutes.
Add remaining coconut milk and bring to simmer.
Add chicken or vegetables and cook for 8-10 minutes.
Add eggplant and green beans, cook for another 5-7 minutes.
Add kaffir lime leaves and season with fish sauce.
Taste and adjust seasoning as needed.
Top with fresh basil before serving.
Serve with jasmine rice.

title: Beef Tacos
summary: Seasoned ground beef served in soft tortillas with fresh toppings and salsa.
instructions: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat.
Add diced onion and cook until softened, about 3 minutes.
Add ground beef and cook until browned, breaking it apart as it cooks.
Drain excess fat if needed.
Add taco seasoning and ¼ cup water, simmer for 5 minutes.
Warm tortillas in a dry skillet or over direct heat.
Fill each tortilla with seasoned beef.
Top with lettuce, tomato, cheese, salsa, and sour cream.
Serve immediately with lime wedges.

title: Greek Salad
summary: Fresh vegetables with feta cheese, olives, and a simple olive oil vinaigrette.
instructions: Chop tomatoes and place in a large bowl.
Add diced cucumber, red onion slices, and olives.
Top with crumbled or cubed feta cheese.
In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil and red wine vinegar.
Pour dressing over salad and toss gently.
Sprinkle with oregano to taste.
Season with salt and black pepper.
Serve chilled or at room temperature.
Best served fresh.
